page.title: 12 I LIVE IN A HOTEL
page.content: Our hotel is owned by my mum and dad and nan and grandad.It is only open in the summer season.It is an old building and has 45 bedrooms,1 lounge with a television,1 bar lounge and 1 dining room.My family live in the back of the hotel in a flat.We employ 2 chambermaids,2 waitresses and 2 people to wash up.When the visitors arrive in a coach my sister and I show them to their rooms.All bedrooms have a radio and a wash-hand basin and some have a bathroom and toilet en suite.Breakfast is at 8:00 to 9:00,lunch is available at mid-day and evening meal is at 18:00.In the evening,the guests can take part in competitions,play bingo, make fancy hats and dance to live music or a disco.About three quarters of our visitors return regularly each year.Coach parties come from Bournemo- uth,Bristol,Weymouth and Birmingham.
